name: Air Fryer Oven Beef Jerky
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Using your air fryer oven makes whipping up a big batch of jerky as easy as 1-2-3. All it takes is a few ingredients and some patience. Make sure to cut your beef paper thin or plan on a longer drying time. I find it helpful to freeze the beef for an hour for easy slicing. Refrigerate any that is not consumed in 3 days.
ingredients: 4 pounds London broil, thinly sliced and fat removed
directions: Place beef, jerky seasoning, and 2 tablespoons plus 2 teaspoons cure in a large bowl
Massage beef with your hands until evenly combined
Cover and refrigerate, 8 hours to overnight
Preheat the air fryer to 160 degrees F (70 degrees C)
Place beef slices on the rack, making sure none are overlapping
Open the air fryer and let beef sit for 1 hour for final drying and cooling
